author: radekkapka
content: Speaking of these two metadata fields, I understand completely that someone would like to know whether the data that they got is finalized or not, especially when making historical queries, but can someone remind me what's the point of the `execution_optimistic` field? Since an honest VC will reject performing duties optimistically, in what way can this field affect one's actions? And although I can see some merit with regards to `/validator` endpoints, I don't see one for historical endpoints.
